testimonials.name: Harshil Gummasana
testimonials.text: IT Event Management organized the best hackathon we’ve ever had. Their attention to detail and professionalism were outstanding!

testimonials.text: The conference was a huge success, thanks to the amazing team at IT Event Management. Highly recommended!
